Description: Our newest red enamel fire engine pocket watch is perfect gift for the firefighter in your life. Express your gratitude for the fact that he is putting his life on the line every time he goes to work, when you give him a shiny new fire truck pocket watch. Inspired from watches for men from a bygone era, your favorite fire fighter will love this unusual piece of firefighter jewelry. This colorful and meaningful mens chain pocket watch will certainly catch his eye. Show your hero just how much you appreciate his courage and bravery. A new fire truck pocket watch is a perfect gift for a rookie fireman or an experienced one. It will even make a sensational gift for volunteer firefighters or one who has recently retired. Secured with a detachable 14.5 inch curb chain that features a belt clip on the other end, this fun and fashionable Simulated Quartz movement pocket watch is sure to become one of his treasured possessions before long. The Arabic numbers make it easy to read. Order yours today.
